channel.title: Cheat Engine Dupe [Crazy Dupe]
channel.description: Hey, my friends just did a cheat engine dupe, he got all his stats 99 and freezed the ID and got more stuff. How can I fix this? -snip-

item.title: Cheat Engine Dupe [Crazy Dupe]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This looks more like advertising than it does requesting for help. Post a new thread in the client help board describing the details as much as possible without this link.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine Dupe [Crazy Dupe]
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:542962”]Dumbest pdf I’ve ever read.

Validate your packets and you won’t have skids like this duping and opening interfaces.

Validate meaning, you need to check if what they send, is correct.

If they try and click and object that doesn’t exist in the server, or they are not within a certain distance to the object, stop them from clicking it.

If they try to pick up something that doesn’t exist in the list of ground items, don’t allow them to pick it up.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Engine Dupe [Crazy Dupe]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Dumbest pdf I’ve ever read.

Validate your packets and you won’t have skids like this duping and opening interfaces.

Validate meaning, you need to check if what they send, is correct.

If they try and click and object that doesn’t exist in the server, or they are not within a certain distance to the object, stop them from clicking it.

If they try to pick up something that doesn’t exist in the list of ground items, don’t allow them to pick it up.

Read full topic
